Positions of Miri, Taw. Dhank and Topography between Dhankand, Ibri Sketched from Jebel Ab/ud Pt 4970 wlh one ray only on each point ibri,and Diriz, from 4970 and bearing from 4900pf.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘REDUCTION TO SHOW RELATIONSHIP of the COMBINED PLANE TABLE AND PRISMATIC COMPASS SKETCH MAP OF THE COUNTRY BETWEEN JEBEL RŌDHAH, SOHAR AND IBRI, OMAN, ARABIA, WITH THE OMAN PENINSULA’

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.Includes a note on map compilation below title with a key of reference at the lower left.On verso, at the top right-hand corner: ‘OA 6021, 7-12-25’. Top left: ‘PLATE VI’. Bottom left: ‘M.R. REG., NO. 81, APRIL 1926’.
